name: AbrasiveCraft Emailer
short_description:
Current Version: 1.0
Release Date: March 2014
OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8
• Released

(EMAILER DOES NOT WORK RIGHT NOW, PLEASE WAIT FOR A FIX. I WILL MAKE SURE TO TELL YOU WHEN IT WORKS AGAIN! :) - HBYRD)

AbrasiveCraft Emailer can send emails to anyone anonymously. Just enter the recipient, sender, subject, and message! 100% Anonymous and free guaranteed! No sign up, password, or anything required!

If you encounter a problem and the email doesn't send, try the following:
• Log on as admin on your computer
• Run AbrasiveCraft Emailer as admin
• Allow application for incoming and outgoing connections in firewall or turn firewall off
• If the domain you are trying to send to is listed below, the recipient will not recieve any mail

Unworking Mail Servers:
• pers.craigslist.org
• sfr.fr
• neuf.fr
• axcelis.com
• contegogroup.com
